title: Network BUG after Champ Select
body:
Theres a bug going around that ive seen mentioned in the NA and EUW server. The bug is after champ select, instead of the loading screen showing, a network error keeps showing up.

Note that my ping after a speedtest is 19, and everything runs smoothly in terms of streaming etc.

Please check this out asap, as this has been ongoing for me for the past 3 weeks. 

Thanks
